title: ProShares embraces spot Bitcoin ETF impact on BITO futures
description:
ProShares sees benefits of the launch of spot Bitcoin ETFs for its Bitcoin futures products, according to a senior investment strategist.

ProShares, a major issuer of futures-based Bitcoin (BTC) exchange-traded funds (ETF), doesn’t face any threats potentially associated with the launch of spot Bitcoin ETFs in the United States, according to a senior executive.

ProShares sees benefits from the launch of spot Bitcoin ETFs for its futures products, both on the operational and commercial sides, ProShares’ global investment strategist Simeon Hyman said in an interview with Cointelegraph on Feb. 2.

The company’s flagship Bitcoin futures ETF, the ProShares Bitcoin Strategy ETF (BITO), has seen “very efficient” trading volumes with the launch of spot Bitcoin ETFs, Hyman said.

Read more

title: Distributed Key Generation Tool Boosts PoS Validator Security at SVV.Network
description: Distributed Validator Technology or DVT has been getting a lot of attention for its ability to bolster the resilience and security of blockchain validators on proof-of-stake networks such as Ethereum.

title: Microsoft Gaming Division Announces Layoffs and Leadership Changes
description: In a significant development within the video game industry, Microsoft’s Gaming division has made the tough decision to lay off approximately 1,900 employees, affecting around 9% of its workforce.  This decision comes from restructuring efforts, particularly impacting Activision Blizzard, Xbox, and ZeniMax. title: Labor Proposes Mandatory AI Safety Testing for Tech Companies
description: In a bid to strengthen oversight and accountability in the development of artificial intelligence (AI) technology, the UK’s Labour Party has unveiled plans to make it mandatory for tech companies to conduct AI safety tests and share the results with the government.
